meanings.definition: A painful swelling filled with pus on the gum.
meanings.sent1: The dentist treated the gumboils with care.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't eat properly due to the gumboils on her gum.
meanings.sent3: The gumboils made him talk funny, like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The gumboils were like tiny volcanoes erupting on his gum.
meanings.sent5: The throbbing pain from the gumboils was unbearable.

meanings.definition: To develop or form a gumboil.
meanings.sent1: If you don't take care of your teeth, you may gumboils.
meanings.sent2: He was worried that his neglect of oral hygiene would gumboils.
meanings.sent3: She joked that if she ate too much candy, she would gumboils like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The idea of neglecting his dental health would gumboils in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The thought of gumboils forming made him shudder.
